verses.verse: וְיִפְתָּ֣ח <S%H3316><s%> ve-yif-Tach Now Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֗י <S%H1569><s%> hag-gil-'a-Di, the Gileadite הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor was a mighty man חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil, of valour וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- and he [was] the son אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah ess זוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah; commit fornication וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led begat גִּלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad and Gilead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִפְתָּֽח׃ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach. Jephthah

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led bare אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> 'e-shet- wife גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad And Gilead's ל֖וֹ lo בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim; him sons וַיִּגְדְּל֨וּ <S%H1431><s%> vai-yig-de-Lu grew up בְֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- sons הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah and his wife's וַיְגָרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1644><s%> vay-ga-re-Shu and they thrust out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִפְתָּ֗ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach, Jephthah וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru and said לוֹ֙ lo לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִנְחַ֣ל <S%H5157><s%> tin-Chal unto him Thou shalt not inherit בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> be-veit- house אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-nu, in our father's כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- for thou [art] the son אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah woman אַחֶ֖רֶת <S%H312><s%> 'a-Che-ret of a strange אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah. you

וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <S%H1272><s%> vai-yiv-Rach fled יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach Then Jephthah מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, his brethren וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land ט֑וֹב <S%H2897><s%> Tov; of Tob וַיִּֽתְלַקְּט֤וּ <S%H3950><s%> vai-yit-lak-ke-Tu and there were gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach to Jephthah אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim men רֵיקִ֔ים <S%H7386><s%> rei-Kim, vain וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-tze-'U and went out עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with פ Peh

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came מִיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim; And it came to pass in process of time וַיִּלָּחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu made war בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- that the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. against Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher- after נִלְחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> nil-cha-Mu made war בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And it was so that when the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead לָקַ֥חַת <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chat to fetch אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִפְתָּ֖ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach Jephthah מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2897><s%> Tov. of Tob

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said לְיִפְתָּ֔ח <S%H3316><s%> le-yif-Tach, unto Jephthah לְכָ֕ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah Come וְהָיִ֥יתָה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-tah become לָּ֖נוּ La-nu לְקָצִ֑ין <S%H7101><s%> le-ka-Tzin; and be our captain וְנִֽלָּחֲמָ֖ה <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-la-cha-Mah that we may fight בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei with the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach And Jephthah לְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> le-zik-Nei unto the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you שְׂנֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H8130><s%> se-ne-Tem Did not ye hate אוֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti, וַתְּגָרְשׁ֖וּנִי <S%H1644><s%> vat-te-ga-re-Shu-ni me and expel מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit court אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi; me out of my father's וּמַדּ֜וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> u-mad-Du-a' have you בָּאתֶ֤ם <S%H935><s%> ba-Tem come אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me עַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> 'At-tah, now כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צַ֥ר <S%H6862><s%> tzar adversary לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei And the elders גִלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִפְתָּ֗ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach, unto Jephthah לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen this עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah have now שַׁ֣בְנוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shav-nu Therefore we turn again אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to you וְהָלַכְתָּ֣ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-lach-Ta to thee now that thou mayest go עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu, us וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֖ <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-cham-Ta with us and fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon; of Ammon וְהָיִ֤יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta and become לָּ֙נוּ֙ la-nu לְרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh, and be our head לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִפְתָּ֜ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach And Jephthah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei unto the elders גִלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If מְשִׁיבִ֨ים <S%H7725><s%> me-shi-Vim If ye bring me home again אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Ti לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei against the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וְנָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan deliver יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai; them before אָנֹכִ֕י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh. band

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said זִקְנֵֽי־ <S%H2205><s%> zik-nei- And the elders גִלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִפְתָּ֑ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach; unto Jephthah יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sho-Me-a' be witness בֵּֽינוֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H996><s%> bei-no-Tei-nu, between אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not כִדְבָרְךָ֖ <S%H1697><s%> chid-va-re-Cha not so according to thy words כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh. between us if we do

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach Then Jephthah עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei with the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu made הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people אוֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem over לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh him head וּלְקָצִ֑ין <S%H7101><s%> u-le-ka-Tzin; and captain וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber uttered יִפְתָּ֧ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach over them and Jephthah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all דְּבָרָ֛יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav all his words לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah. in Mizpeh פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach And Jephthah מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim, messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech unto the king בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What לִּ֣י li וָלָ֔ךְ va-Lach, כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that בָ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> Va-ta What hast thou to do with me that thou art come אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem against me to fight בְּאַרְצִֽי׃ <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-Tzi. common

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer answered מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chei unto the messengers יִפְתָּ֗ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach, of Jephthah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because לָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took away יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Because Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצִי֙ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzi my land בַּעֲלוֹת֣וֹ <S%H5927><s%> ba-'a-lo-To when they came up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt מֵאַרְנ֥וֹן <S%H769><s%> me-'ar-Non from Arnon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far הַיַּבֹּ֖ק <S%H2999><s%> hai-yab-Bok even unto Jabbok וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; and unto Jordan וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now הָשִׁ֥יבָה <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shi-vah now therefore restore those [lands] again אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> 'et-Hen בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> be-sha-Lom. peaceably

וַיּ֥וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> vai-Yo-sef again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od But יִפְתָּ֑ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach; And Jephthah וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim, messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech unto the king בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said ל֔וֹ lo, כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יִפְתָּ֑ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach; Jephthah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor לָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took not away יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz nor the land בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon
